Microfibre nursing top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with moulded, padded cups, a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.

Short dress in a lustrous weave with a V-neck and wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud. Opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, long cuffed sleeves with a slit running down, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in patterned satin with lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Lace trim at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastenings at the back.
Brogue-patterned trainers in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
